{{also|land|länd|lǟnd|-land}} ==English== ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun}} # {{surname|en|from=Middle English}} #* '''2012''', Peter Moormann, ''Music and Game: Perspectives on a Popular Alliance'' (page 82) #*: After the success of ''Secret of Monkey Island'' (1990), composer Michael '''Land''' longed for a more flexible system to integrate his music into a game. ====Derived terms==== * {{l|en|Land camera}} ---- ==Albanian== =====Alternative forms===== * {{alter|sq|Landi}} ===Etymology=== “Heath-dweller; pasture-dweller”, probably from {{m|sq|lëndë||matter, timber}}, connected to {{m|sq|lëndinë||pasture, grassland}}. ===Proper noun=== {{sq-proper noun|m}} # {{given name|sq|male}}. ---- ==Alemannic German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|gsw|gmh|lant}}, from {{inh|gsw|goh|lant}}, from {{inh|gsw|gem-pro|*landą}}. Cognate with {{cog|de|Land}}, {{cog|nl|-}}, {{cog|en|-}}, and {{cog|da|land}}, {{cog|got|𐌻𐌰𐌽𐌳}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{a|Zurich}} {{IPA|gsw|/lɒnd/}} ===Noun=== {{head|gsw|noun|g=n|plural|Länder}} # [[land]] # [[country]] ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|lant}}, from {{inh|de|goh|lant}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*landą}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*lendʰ-|t=land, heath}}. Compare {{cog|nl|-}}, {{cog|en|-}}, and {{cog|da|land}}, {{cog|got|𐌻𐌰𐌽𐌳}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/lant/}} * {{audio|de|De-Land.ogg|audio}} * {{rhymes|de|ant}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n|Landes|Länder|gen2=Lands|pl2=Lande|Ländchen|dim2=Ländlein}} # [[country]] {{gloss|territory of a nation}} # [[state]], [[province]] {{gloss|political division of a federation retaining a notable degree of autonomy}} # [[land]] {{gloss|real estate or landed property}} # [[land]] {{gloss|part of Earth which is not covered by oceans or other bodies of water}} # country, [[countryside]] {{gloss|rural area, as opposed to a town or city}} ====Usage notes==== * The normal plural is '''''Länder'''''. The plural '''''Lande''''' is elevated or poetic, and is occasionally used in modern German to mean "countryside, vast areas", e.g. ''die weiten '''Lande''' Sibiriens'' – "the wide '''lands''' of Siberia". ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|(e)s|pl=Länder}} {{de-decl-noun-n|(e)s|pl=Lande}} ====Hyponyms==== * ''See:'' [[:Category:de:Countries]] ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de |[[aller Herren Ländern]] (aus aller Herren Ländern, in aller Herren Ländern, nach aller Herren Ländern), [[aller Herren Länder]] (durch aller Herren Länder, für aller Herren Länder, ''but also'' aus aller Herren Länder, in aller Herren Länder) |Bundesland |Landesvater |Landesverrat |Landesverfassung |Landesgrenze |Landesteil |landlos |Landstreicher |Landstrich |Niemandsland |Ursprungsland |Herkunftsland
